
                            
                            <p>一个是买理财的，还算稳，根据自己资产买七天的理财 <br>  <br> 一个是买各种债券和股票基金，都点进去，买10块得2元立减金的无脑买，100块的谨慎买，5000块的不买 <br>  <br> 在交行活动中心，全部活动， <br> 基会多多 以及 财运多多 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155605csqh91p1lcllxpl2.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155605csqh91p1lcllxpl2.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155612x8g8kktz6ifkgffn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155612x8g8kktz6ifkgffn.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155619fz36jzaahqghqakw.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/12/155619fz36jzaahqghqakw.jpg"> <br>  </p>
